articles.content: Staff at CNN's short-lived streaming service CNN+ have been left 'aghast and furious' at management after the decision to end the service after only three weeks - describing it as 'an absolute debacl… [+6884 chars]

articles.author: Sky
articles.title: Co-op scraps yoghurt use-by dates as research suggests 50% of pots are thrown away unopened - Sky News
articles.content:
Use-by dates on Co-op yoghurts are to be scrapped, the company has announced.
The supermarket giant instead plans to use best-before dates.
It says the move is an industry first - and will apply to… [+1217 chars]

articles.title: Scientists make ‘miracle material’ breakthrough to revolutionise solar power - The Independent
articles.description: Discovery will help realise ‘the global zero-carbon sustainability goal’, researchers say
articles.content:
Scientists have discovered a way to make ultra-efficient solar cells on a commercial scale using the miracle material perovskite.
